title.rendered: Mandatory notification of trade in Aqualis ASA

content.rendered:
On April 22 2015, Gross Management, a company owned 50% (indirectly) by board member Øystein Stray Spetalen and 50% (indirectly) by board member Glen Ole Rødland, primary insider insider pursuant to STA §§ 4-2 (1) third sentence. cf. § 3-6 (3), acquired 87 223 shares at an average purchase price of NOK 8.55,- per share,
After the transaction Gross Management AS and associated companies hold 3 367 996 shares in Aqualis ASA corresponding to 7.8 % of the outstanding shares.
